original_title: The Last Chance Detectives: Mystery Lights of Navajo Mesa
overview: Adventure - At the outskirts of a tiny town deep in the desert, where a B-17 airplane rests next to a run-down, old diner, something peculiar is happening. It began as an unfamiliar voice coming through an antique radio, but then things began to disappear â€¦ and now, a strange light keeps appearing. Four youngsters decide to look into this mystery, and in the process, they learn a valuable biblical lesson about forgiveness.
title: The Last Chance Detectives: Mystery Lights of Navajo Mesa
